name: companies_id_people
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool german_company_data_v2.
Tool description: Enrich your CRM / MAS / ERP system with credible data about all incorporated companies from  Germany.
API description: This endpoint returns the information about people associated with the company with the given identifier. The information includes names, roles, email addresses, and phone numbers, if available.

is_id.description: The identifier of the company whose associated people's information is to be retrieved.
